text: Bachia barbouri, Barbour's bachia, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Peru. ==References== Category:Bachia Category:Reptiles described in 1931 Category:Reptiles of Peru Category:Endemic fauna of Peru Category:Taxa named by Charles Earle Burt Category:Taxa named by May Danheim Burt
title: Bachia barbouri
